metadata.title: ALDER'S ADDITIONS: First Strike
metadata.author: Alder
metadata.description:
Now updated to 5.4!
This addon for FTL: Multiverse incorporates a significant array of new equipment that can be found on your runs. It will be the foundation of a larger project moving forward.
Special thanks to: - Chrono Vortex, Julk, Arc, and Vertaalfout for guiding me through the Lua scripts. - Tabbi and Terry, for balancing feedback. - R4V3-ON, for encouragement and art tips.
